structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 32. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3313.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Duties of city attorney in cities of the thrid class.
